mdRecord.dcterms:title: Herschel, artifact; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 4. Forensic Identification Reference Material (FIRM)Items 4-26, Fingerprinting--Fiorenza (Multiple articles, notes, news clippings found together in labeled binder.)A photograph copy of an artifact from the New York Institute of Criminology which shows a palmprint and a written agreement in English and what appears to be Hindi. It states it is between W.J. Herschel and Rājyadhar Konāi in 1858. Typewritten information regards the IAI conference at which it was presented in 1957.; 1 item.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
International Association for Identification
Palmprints
